> ::Hevn::
>        He smiles at her mildly.  "Dear Blackstorm, if I couldn't 
defend

on the 
> table resting his head in his hand while still looking her in the 
eye.  "Now 
> then, don't worry about me.  Only worry about your happiness.  
What would
